languages.text: "Я только этим участком руковожу… Руководил. Глава колонии сказал, мол, теперь с вами бывший арбитр — слушайтесь, впитывайте. Может, чему научитесь, пыль планетоидная".

"I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."
languages.original_text: "Я только этим участком руковожу… Руководил. Глава колонии сказал, мол, теперь с вами бывший арбитр — слушайтесь, впитывайте. Может, чему научитесь, пыль планетоидная".

traits.locale_text: "I am in charge of just this sector… Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that now we have an ex-arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

"I am in charge of just this sector… Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that now we have an ex-arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

"I am in charge of just this sector… Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now we have an ex-arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

"I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

"I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

languages.text: 「私はこの星域の管理だけをしています…いえ、していたと言った方がいいですね。コロニーの責任者は言いました。元アービトレイターが来たからには、彼の知恵に従い、学ぶべきだと。『小惑星に住む塵を食べる者たち』とも言われましたが、それは今は関係ありません」
languages.original_text: "I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの星域の管理だけをしています…いえ、していたと言った方がいいですね。コロニーの責任者は言いました。元アービトレイターが来たからには、彼の知恵に従い、学ぶべきだと。『小惑星に住む塵を食べる者たち』とも言われましたが、それは今は関係ありません」

languages.text: "Ich bin nur für diesen Sektor zuständig ... Oder zumindest war ich es. Die Leitung der Kolonie meinte, wenn wir schon einen ehemaligen Arbitrator haben, sollten wir auf seine Weisheit hören und von ihm lernen. Er hat uns auch Planetoiden-Staubschlucker genannt, aber darum geht's jetzt nicht."
languages.original_text: "I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nur für diesen Sektor zuständig ... Oder zumindest war ich es. Die Leitung der Kolonie meinte, wenn wir schon einen ehemaligen Arbitrator haben, sollten wir auf seine Weisheit hören und von ihm lernen. Er hat uns auch Planetoiden-Staubschlucker genannt, aber darum geht's jetzt nicht."

languages.text: « Je suis uniquement en charge de ce secteur... Ou du moins, je l'étais. Le dirigeant de la colonie a décidé qu'en présence d'un ex-arbitrator, nous ferions mieux de nous plier à sa volonté et de tirer enseignement de sa sagesse. Il nous a aussi traités de bouffeurs de poussière de planétoïde, mais je m'écarte du sujet. »
languages.original_text: "I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis uniquement en charge de ce secteur... Ou du moins, je l'étais. Le dirigeant de la colonie a décidé qu'en présence d'un ex-arbitrator, nous ferions mieux de nous plier à sa volonté et de tirer enseignement de sa sagesse. Il nous a aussi traités de bouffeurs de poussière de planétoïde, mais je m'écarte du sujet. »

languages.text: «Solamente estoy al mando de este sector... O lo estaba, en todo caso. El líder de la colonia dijo que, como tenemos a un antiguo Arbitrator, debemos someternos a su sabiduría y aprender de ella. También nos llamó tragapolvos de planetoide, pero eso no viene al caso».
languages.original_text: "I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

traits.locale_text: «Solamente estoy al mando de este sector... O lo estaba, en todo caso. El líder de la colonia dijo que, como tenemos a un antiguo Arbitrator, debemos someternos a su sabiduría y aprender de ella. También nos llamó tragapolvos de planetoide, pero eso no viene al caso».

languages.text: “我确实是这里的负责人……或者说，之前是。总之，这个殖民地的总督说，既然这里来了一位前任法务官成员，那我们应该从他的智慧中学习。总督还管我们叫‘在小行星上吃灰的臭泥腿子’，不过，这不是重点。”
languages.original_text: "I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

traits.locale_text: “我确实是这里的负责人……或者说，之前是。总之，这个殖民地的总督说，既然这里来了一位前任法务官成员，那我们应该从他的智慧中学习。总督还管我们叫‘在小行星上吃灰的臭泥腿子’，不过，这不是重点。”

languages.text: "Ben yalnızca bu sektörün başındayım... Yani öyleydim. Koloni idarecisi, artık aramızda bir eski Yargıcı olduğuna göre kendisinin bilgeliğine kulak verip ondan ders almamız gerektiğini söyledi. Ona göre biz cüce gezegenli toz yiyicilermişiz ama o başka bir konu."
languages.original_text: "I am in charge of just this sector... Or was in charge, anyway. The head of the colony said that, now that we have an ex-Arbitrator, we should heed his wisdom and learn from it. Called us planetoid-dwelling dust-gorgers too, but that is beside the point."

traits.locale_text: "Ben yalnızca bu sektörün başındayım... Yani öyleydim. Koloni yöneticisi artık aramızda bir eski Yargıcı olduğuna göre kendisinin bilgeliğine kulak verip ondan ders almamız gerektiğini söyledi. Ona göre biz cüce gezegenli toz yiyicilermişiz ama orası başka mesele."
